title: Filmed Over 12 Years, 'Boyhood' Follows A Kid's Coming Of Age
teaser: Writer-director Richard Linklater says picking the film's star was vital because he had to guess what he'd be like at 18. "I just went with a kid who seemed kind of the most interesting."
contentencoded:
